description:
A mechanical replacement for http://anidb.net/ch43881 [Valgo] after he was destroyed, the Natter-Valgo unit appears in http://anidb.net/a443 [Macross 7: The Galaxy`s Calling Me] as backup to http://anidb.net/ch43863 [Gavil] and http://anidb.net/ch49520 [Glavil]. It combines with them (in what http://anidb.net/ch43863 [Gavil] calls the "forbidden technique") to form a creature even bigger and more invulnerable than http://anidb.net/ch49594 [Gavigla], though the time for which they can remain merged is limited.
Source: wiki
name: Natter-Valgo
